TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartManagerInternals extends System.Object

summary.span: 隔離成不同的類別方法， 控制項會使用這些方法，而且擴充控制項的開發人員會覆寫這些方法，但網頁開發人員很少需要這些方法。

span.span: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是在 Web 組件控制項集合中的最大類別。The class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set. 它也是最重要的 Web 組件類別，因此它適用於每個網頁，其中包含 Web 組件的控制項，它會協調和管理頁面上的所有 Web 組件控制項。It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page. 因為，經常會使用類別和它包含許多公開的方法，因此某些方法需要主要由控制項開發人員擴充控制項包含在類別。Because the class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the control are contained in the class. 這種隔離的較少使用的方法，到類別簡化的 API類別，而隔離的方法不會出現在在 IntelliSense 中的物件。This isolation of less-used methods into the class simplifies the API of the class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the object in IntelliSense. 使用開發人員類別都可能有的案例它們要繼承自控制並廣泛地自訂它。Developers who use the class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the control and customize it extensively. 例如，如果您要建置 Web 入口網站應用程式或自訂的顯示模式的 Web 組件控制項的封裝的集合，自訂區域、 自訂動詞命令，自訂控制項和其他擴充功能的基底 Web 組件使用者介面 (UI)，在許多情況下 (not所有） 您要覆寫，並擴充某些成員。For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the members. 而即使類別密封格式，因此您無法從它繼承，您的自訂類別可能需要撥打的號碼方法，才能管理頁面上的 Web 組件控制項。And although the class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom class will likely need to call a number of the methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page. > [!NOTE] > 像類別類別提供了沒有 ui 而且永遠不會出現在頁面上的伺服器控制項。Like the class, the class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page. 不同於、類別永遠不會在網頁標記中宣告; 受限於它是執行背景工作的背景工作物件。Unlike , the class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks. 示範使用它的典型方式是類別，即在參考透過受保護屬性，以及使用參考的物件來呼叫方法。The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the class, which references it by means of the protected property, and uses the referenced object to call the methods. 類別僅包含方法，則沒有任何屬性或事件。The class contains only methods; there are no properties or events. 類別中的所有方法牽涉都到管理控制項之間的連接。All the methods in the class involve managing controls, or connections between controls. 處理控制項，包含方法，以加入它們 ()，移除這些)，處理事件)、 取得或設定其關聯性的詳細資料到其區域 (例如， 和)，或設定基本控制屬性 (例如，和)。To handle controls, includes methods for adding them (), removing them ), handling events ), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, and ), or setting basic control properties (for example, and ). 若要處理連接，包含刪除的方法 ()，設定要使用的轉換程式物件 ()，設定連接是否為共用，以及是否為靜態 (和)，並設定要使用的連接錯誤訊息 ()。To handle connections, includes methods for deleting them (), setting which transformer object to use (), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static ( and ), and setting a connection error message to use ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是正在終止現有的連接兩個的其中一個步驟或在網頁上其他伺服器控制項。The method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two or other server controls on a Web page. 它會設定屬性值設定為`true`表示`connection`被刪除。It sets the property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetZoneID (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetZoneID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed
public: System::String ^ GetZoneID(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 位於區域中的 。

span.span: A that resides in a zone.

summary.span: 取得包含指定的 或伺服器控制項的區域 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified or server control.

returns.span: 字串，表示包含 之區域的 ID。

span.span: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回包含所參考之控制項的區域識別碼`webPart`參數。The method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 屬性`webPart`參考包含實際的區域物件`webPart`，不該區域的識別碼。The property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone. 如果`webPart`目前已關閉，值及其屬性是`null`，而方法會傳回識別碼的最後一個區域，`webPart`之前關閉。If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its property is `null`, and the method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.

An that contains the saved state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會儲存使用者設定時所建立的組態資料控制項在網頁上控制項之間的連接的一部分。The method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls. 此設定資料然後重新載入每次轉譯控制項時，使用方法。This configuration data is then reloaded each time the control is rendered, by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetConnectErrorMessage (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string connectErrorMessage);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetConnectErrorMessage(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string connectErrorMessage) cil managed
public: void SetConnectErrorMessage(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, System::String ^ connectErrorMessage);

param.name: webPart
param.span: ，參與其他控制項的連接。

span.span: A that participates in a connection with another control.

param.name: connectErrorMessage
param.span: 包含錯誤訊息文字的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the error message.

summary.span: 建立錯誤訊息，並且讓負責呈現 控制項的 物件呈現該訊息，而不是控制項的內容。

span.span: Establishes an errors message, and causes the object that is responsible for rendering a control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您建立關聯的錯誤訊息參與連線的控制項。The method allows you to associate an error message with a control that participates in connections. 如果另一個控制項建立連接，與所參考的控制項時發生錯誤`webPart`參數，然後在連線程序失敗後，會顯示錯誤訊息中的使用者介面 (UI)，而不是的內容`webPart`.If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`. 物件相關聯`webPart`轉譯中的錯誤訊息其方法。The object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetHasSharedData (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool hasSharedData);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetHasSharedData(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool hasSharedData) cil managed
public: void SetHasSharedData(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, bool hasSharedData);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 可以具有共用個人化資料的 或其他伺服器控制項。

span.span: A or other server control that can have shared personalization data.

param.name: hasSharedData
param.span: 指出 webPart 是否具有共用資料的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart has shared data.

summary.span: 在 或其他伺服器控制項上設定屬性，指出控制項是否具有共用個人化資料。

span.span: Sets a property on a or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會指出是否`webPart`已共用的個人化資料。The method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data. 值`hasSharedData`傳遞至方法的參數指派給`webPart`控制項的屬性。The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's property.

param.span: 可以具有使用者個人化資料的 或其他伺服器控制項。

span.span: A or other server control that can have user personalization data.

param.name: hasUserData
param.span: 指出 webPart 是否具有共用資料的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart has shared data.

summary.span: 在 或其他伺服器控制項上設定屬性，指出控制項是否具有使用者個人化資料。

span.span: Sets a property on a or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會指出是否`webPart`有個別的使用者個人化資料，而不是共用資料。The method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data. 方法會將指派的值`hasUserData`參數`webPart`控制項的屬性。The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsClosed (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isClosed);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIsClosed(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isClosed) cil managed
public: void SetIsClosed(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, bool isClosed);

param.name: webPart
param.span: ，這個方法為其設定 屬性。

span.span: A for which this method sets the property.

param.name: isClosed
param.span: 布林值，指出網頁上的 是否已關閉。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a is closed on a page.

summary.span: 設定 控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定屬性`webPart`。The method sets the property of `webPart`. 這個方法不會實際關閉`webPart`; 它只會設定屬性，指出是否`webPart`已關閉。This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.

summary.span: 設定 控制項的 屬性或 物件的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control or the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫的方法來設定此屬性，指出控制項的特定執行個體是否為共用的基底類別中。The method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared. Web 組件集中控制，共用的控制表示網頁的所有使用者都都可以看到的控制項。In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page. 這是相較於每個使用者控制項，也就是只將控制項加入頁面的特定使用者為可見。This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page. > [!NOTE] > 多個在個人化和共用與每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsShared (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isShared);

public: void SetIsShared(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, bool isShared);

param.name: webPart
param.span: ，這個方法為其設定 屬性。

span.span: A for which this method sets the property.

param.name: isShared
param.span: 指出 webPart 是否為共用的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart is shared.

summary.span: 設定 控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法實際上也不會導致參考的控制項`webPart`參數共用; 它只會設定屬性，指出是否`webPart`目前共用。The method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.

public: void SetIsStandalone(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, bool isStandalone);

param.name: webPart
param.span: ，這個方法為其設定 屬性。

span.span: A for which this method sets the property.

param.name: isStandalone
param.span: 指出 webPart 是否為獨立控制項的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart is a standalone control.

summary.span: 設定 控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定屬性。The method sets the property. 當這個屬性設定為`true`上控制項，表示控制項未包含在區域。When this property is set to `true` on a control, it means that the control is not contained within a zone.

summary.span: 設定 控制項的 屬性或 物件的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control or the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫的方法來設定此屬性，指出是否為靜態控制項的特定執行個體的基底類別中。The method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static. Web 組件控制項集合中，靜態控制項是在網頁標記中宣告的控制項。In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page. 這是相較於動態控制項，可加入至網頁以程式設計的方式，或者加入由使用者從控制項的目錄。This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls. 靜態控制項原本就是共用的控制項，這表示，它會顯示的頁面上，所有使用者，雖然使用者可以關閉靜態控制項，但是可以永遠不會刪除 （永久移除） 它。A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it. > [!NOTE] > 如需個人化的詳細資訊，靜態和動態控制項，以及共用與每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsStatic (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isStatic);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIsStatic(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isStatic) cil managed
public: void SetIsStatic(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, bool isStatic);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 為其設定屬性值的控制項。

span.span: The control for which the property value is being set.

param.name: isStatic
param.span: 指出 webPart 是否為靜態的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether webPart is static.

summary.span: 設定 控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來設定屬性值所參考的控制項`webPart`參數。The method is used to set the property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. 如果`webPart`在網頁上，這個方法會設定屬性值的標記中的區域中宣告了`true`。If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`. 如果`webPart`會加入至網頁以程式設計的方式，或由使用者透過 Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI)，這個方法會將屬性值設`false`。If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsStatic (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection connection, bool isStatic);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIsStatic(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection connection, bool isStatic) cil managed
Public Sub SetIsStatic (connection As WebPartConnection, isStatic As Boolean)
public: void SetIsStatic(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartConnection ^ connection, bool isStatic);

param.name: connection
param.span: 為其設定屬性值的連接。

span.span: The connection for which the property value is being set.

param.name: isStatic
param.span: 指出 connection 是否為靜態的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether connection is static.

summary.span: 設定 物件的 屬性。

span.span: Sets the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來設定屬性值所參考的連接`connection`參數。The method is used to set the property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter. 如果`connection`網頁上，這個方法會設定屬性值的標記中宣告`true`。If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`. 如果`connection`會加入至網頁以程式設計的方式，或由使用者透過 Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI)，這個方法會將屬性值設`false`。If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetTransformer (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection connection, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer transformer);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetTransformer(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection connection, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer transformer) cil managed
Public Sub SetTransformer (connection As WebPartConnection, transformer As WebPartTransformer)
public: void SetTransformer(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartConnection ^ connection, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartTransformer ^ transformer);

param.name: connection
param.span: ，會在伺服器控制項之間建立連接。

span.span: A that creates a connection between server controls.

param.name: transformer
param.span: 與 connection 搭配使用的 。

span.span: A to be used with connection.

summary.span: 指派要在兩個伺服器控制項之間的連接中使用的 物件。

span.span: Assigns a object to be used in a connection between two server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當兩個伺服器控制項之間的連線需要轉換程式，以便消費者控制項可以解譯資料，從提供者的控制項，呼叫方法，提供特定物件物件。When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the method is called to supply a specific object to the object. 如果連接已有指派給它的轉換器，所參考的物件`transformer`參數會覆寫現有; 否則在參考的物件`transformer`使用參數。If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used. 控制使用每當您呼叫的方法方法，以建立需要轉換程式的連接。The control uses the method whenever you call the method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetZoneID (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string zoneID);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetZoneID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string zoneID) cil managed
public: void SetZoneID(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, System::String ^ zoneID);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 正設定其 zoneID 屬性值的 。

span.span: The whose zoneID property value is being set.

param.name: zoneID
param.span: 包含 webPart 所屬區域之 ID 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the zone that webPart belongs to.

summary.span: 設定屬性，讓 或伺服器控制項保留包含區域的 ID。

span.span: Sets a property that enables a or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫負責控制何時控制項新增至區域。This method is called by the control when a control is being added to a zone. 每個控制項正在追蹤其所屬的區域的識別碼，這個方法會設定保留的識別碼值的屬性。Each control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetZoneIndex (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, int zoneIndex);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetZoneIndex(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, int32 zoneIndex) cil managed
public: void SetZoneIndex(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart, int zoneIndex);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 方法設定區域索引的 控制項。

span.span: A control for which the method sets a zone index.

param.name: zoneIndex
param.span: webPart 在其區域內相對於區域中其他控制項的索引。

span.span: The index of webPart within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.

summary.span: 在指定的控制項的區域 (與該區域內其他 控制項相關聯) 內設定指定控制項的索引。

span.span: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other controls within the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷序數位置，`webPart`佔用的區域，區域中其他伺服器控制項的相對位置。The method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
